short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add all the coupons to your loyalty card

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline Your Couponing Experience.

Say goodbye to endless scrolling and individually clipping coupons. InClips automatically clips all available digital coupons, saving you valuable time and maximizing your savings. Simplify your shopping routine with InClips today!

1. Signup and Login to your local supermarket
2. Using the pop-up windows you can quickly get to your coupons page
3. Click on the button to clip all the coupons to your account
